subject: Data
title: Cumulative vs. Daily: The Shape-Shifting Chart
description: A fast breakdown of Cumulative vs. Daily: The Shape-Shifting Chart for builders.

hook.text: During COVID, cumulative case charts always went up. Daily case charts showed waves. Same data, different feel.

buildup.text: Cumulative charts add each day's value to the total â€” they can never go down, only flatten.

discovery.text: Daily charts show the rate of change. Cumulative charts show the total. Each answers different questions.

twist.text: Media outlets switched between them depending on which told the more alarming story at the time.

climax.text: Knowing the difference between cumulative and rate-based charts prevents being misled by shape alone.

punchline.text: A chart that can never go down always looks scary.

quiz.question: Why do cumulative charts always go up?
options: Each day's value is added to the total, which can never decrease
